cosmos.question: I'm big and bright, and I shine at night. I give the Earth its light. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am very far away.
🌞 I only come out at night, but I’m still a star!
🌕 Sometimes I'm round, sometimes I'm a crescent.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of fire way up high. I keep our planet warm, up in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I can be very hot!
⏰ I come out every day.
🌍 The Earth goes around me.

cosmos.question: I’m a group of stars that make a picture in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ People long ago used to tell stories about me.
🐻 Some of me look like animals!
🌌 You can see many of me on a clear night.

cosmos.question: I am the planet we live on. I have lots of water and land. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I'm the only planet we know of with lots of water.
🏠 People and animals live here.
💚 I am mostly blue and green when seen from space.

cosmos.question: I’m a rocky object that flies around the Sun, but I'm smaller than a planet. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 Some people think I caused the dinosaurs to disappear.
💥 I can crash into planets!
☄️ I am smaller than the Earth.

cosmos.question: I am a very hot ball of gas that is far, far away, much further than the Sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I twinkle brightly in the night sky.
🔥 I am made of hot, glowing gas.
💫 I am much bigger and brighter than planets.

cosmos.question: I am a planet known for my beautiful rings. What planet am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are made of ice and rock.
🪐 I am a very big planet.
💨 I am made mostly of gas.

cosmos.question: I am a ball of ice and dust with a long, bright tail when I get close to the Sun. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ My tail always points away from the Sun.
💫 I only visit the inner solar system sometimes.
☄️ I'm like a dirty snowball.

cosmos.question: I am a place with billions of stars, dust, and gas all held together by gravity. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I can be spiral-shaped.
🌌 Our solar system lives inside of me.
✨ I am huge! You need a telescope to see a lot of me.

cosmos.question: I am the first planet from the sun, known for being very hot and very small. What am I?

hints.text: 🌡️ I have no moons
🌞 I orbit the sun faster than any other planet
🌑 I look gray.

transport.question: I have wheels and go on the road. You can ride me to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🚌 I am often yellow.
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Many children ride on me together.
🛑 I stop to pick up and drop off.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and have wings. I take people to far away places. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am bigger than a bird.
✈️ I make a loud noise when I fly.
💺 People sit inside me.

transport.question: I go on the water and carry people or things. I can be big or small. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I float.
⚓ I might have a horn.
🚢 Sometimes I have a sail.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you use your feet to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 👧 You can ride me in the park.
🔔 I often have a bell.
⛑️ You should wear a helmet when you ride me.

transport.question: I run on tracks and carry many people. I travel between cities. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I follow a special path.
📢 People wait for me at a station.
🚝 I am longer than a bus.

transport.question: I am like a car, but smaller and faster. I have two wheels and you need a helmet. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 I can go very fast.
⛽ I need gas to run.
🛣️ I'm often used for longer trips than a bicycle.

transport.question: I am a car that you can wave down. I take you where you want to go for a price. What am I?

hints.text: 🚕 I am usually yellow in some cities.
🚖 I have a meter to count how much you owe.
🙋 You can call me or find me in a taxi rank.

transport.question: I fly with spinning blades on top. I can go straight up and down. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can land in small spaces.
🚨 I am used in emergencies.
⛑️ Sometimes I rescue people.

transport.question: I carry lots of things. I have many wheels and a big trailer behind me. What am I?

hints.text: 📦 I deliver things to shops.
🚚 I am very big and long.
🚧 Be careful when I turn.

transport.question: I go very fast to outer space. I need a countdown before I launch. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I am very tall and pointy.
👩‍🚀 Astronauts ride in me.
🪐 I travel beyond the Earth.
